title: Countries
desc:
- <:country:1120863204407521351> cards color is based off their flag. (Eg. The US would be (<:country:1120863204407521351>+<:red:1106234051129507932>+<:white:1107514189574045726>+<:blue:1106234079055200378>)
- Each country gives a single resource, buff, or debuff to the player that owns the country
- When a player plays a <:country:1120863204407521351>, they now own the country that was played.
- Each <:country:1120863204407521351> card is unique and cannot be drawn twice execpt by copycat cards. If a country is played again, the player who played it most reciently is the owner.
- <:country:1120863204407521351> cards must be real or fictional places with proper names. As long as its a place with a name you are good.
- If a place owns another place from whatever media you use (or irl) they are considered not to be owned. [US does not own Alabama, even though it kinda does irl.]
- If you make a political joke related to a country when you play it, the next player draws a card. No one is allowed to get mad over the joke, its just a joke.
